Hi, I'm Bob Cabbage. You may remember me from such classic software as 'Bob Cabbage's Computer Basketball' and 'Bob Cabbage's FUN! With Personal Finance'. Here at Bob Cabbage, Inc., we've finally decided to take the next step in modern soft-tainment development and developed this program for the 'smart phone'. A computer in your pocket, whoda thunk?


Bob Cabbage's Meme Machine is YOUR one-stop shop for generating all those wacky little graphics that Agnes at the bingo club keeps forwarding to your E-Mail. That's right, now that power is in the palm of your very hand! Simply take an image with your particular doodad's built-in camera, or select one that you've saved already. Then you can add both top AND bottom text! The fun never ends, huh?


When you're ready to generate your meme, simply tap the 'Generate' button at the bottom of the screen, and voila! There's your meme right there! Now, if you don't like the color or size of the text, you can hit the 'Preferences' button to change that any which way you like! And of course, you can always hit the 'Back' button on your phone to go back. The only thing Bob Cabbage's Meme Machine CAN'T do is save the meme you've created to your files, but we're workin' on it!

 Happy Memeing and Keep On A-Computin'!
 Yours always,
 Bob Cabbage
DISCLAIMER: "Bob Cabbage" is not a real person.
